alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson; Dewey; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 7:03PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Corson, southwestern Campbell, northeastern Dewey and northwestern Walworth Counties through 845 PM CDT/745 PM MDT/... At 803 PM CDT/703 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Promise, or 12 miles southwest of Mobridge, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mobridge, Revheim Bay Rec Area, Indian Creek Rec Area, Indian Memorial Rec Area, Grand River Casino and Wakpala. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
